column1: 21:00|21|"JC: Michael Moorcock. Born London in 1939. Went through the Blitz. Came out of World War II wondering why the world was so dull. Left school at 15. Got into journalism and music at a time most of us were starting high school. Editor of Tarzan Adventures at 16
column6: and editor of New Worlds at 24. A long and lively career and all in your first quarter-century . . ."|"The Dreamthief's Daughter"|"Michael Moorcock"
